data.expected_result: The location is the same one you selected before upgrading like it does when you updated to a new TestFlight build (like going from 3415 to 3440)
data.short_description: The share extension does not remember your sharing location when upgrading to a major version of discord
data.steps_to_repro: - First downgrade to any version of TestFlight 2.2.5 or if you have stable 2.2.5 stay on that - Launch discord and let it start up  - Go to pictures and select a picture  - Tap the upload arrow and choose discord  - Select a location and upload it - Now then, you can upgrade back to 2.2.6 TestFlight or 2.2.6 Stable  - Launch discord again and let it load - Now go back to pictures  - Select an image and hit the upload arrow  - Select discord and observe where the location is
